message: or I did it in the ORM by doing a .values_list('duped_field', 'id') and doing the check in python because I knew I could afford to do it in memory
say you have a field on a model that was not constrained as unique, you later decided to do so, and you needed to clean your data of dupe values

is there a way to do that from the ORM?  This is mostly a curiosity - as it is maintenance it can be done in SQL like:

SELECT id
FROM table 
WHERE tablefield IN ( 
 SELECT tablefield
 FROM table 
 GROUP BY tablefield  
 HAVING (COUNT(tablefield ) > 1) 
)
@ptone The few times I've needed to do this, I too just did it in python.
